channel.title: About on Practical Go - Book Website
channel.description: Recent content in About on Practical Go - Book Website

item.title: Hello world
item.description: Hello everyone. “Practical Go: Building Scalable Network and Non-Network Applications” is now out electronically as well as in print. The book targets readers who have learned the Go language basics - syntax, understanding of types, being able to write functions (details are available in the “Getting started” chapter - but essentially, just a passing familiarity with the language is enough I think). I say that and reasonably confidently since that’s where I was when I started writing this book.
